<$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="show" animate="yes" > <$reveal default={{{ [list[$:/temp/fishing]first[]] }}} type="nomatch" text=<> animate="yes" > {{!!title}} <$reveal default={{{ [list[$:/temp/fishing]first[]] }}} type="match" text=<> animate="yes" > <$reveal default={{{ [{!!title}split[__]count[]] }}} type="gteq" text="3" animate="yes" > <$list filter="[{!!title}split[__]]" variable="titleitem" counter="counter" > <$reveal default={{{ [remainder[2]] }}} type="nomatch" text="0" > <> <$reveal default={{{ [remainder[2]] }}} type="match" text="0" > <$let clozeid=<> clozecontent=<> clozecontent={{{ [[$:/temp/fishing]getindexmatch[show]thenelse[` `]] }}} > <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" > <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" $index=<> $value={{{ [[$:/temp/fishing]getindexmatch[show]then[]else[show]] }}} /> <> <$reveal default={{{ [{!!title}split[__]count[]] }}} type="lt" text="3" animate="yes" > {{!!title}} <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="show" animate="yes" > {{!!title}}
"},"Excerpt":{"title":"Excerpt","code-body":"yes","text":"{{{ [{!!title}split[/]last[]] }}} "},"Question":{"title":"Question","tags":"$:/tags/QuestionTemplate","code-body":"yes","text":"
{{!!title}} <$reveal default={{{ [list[$:/temp/fishing]first[]] }}} type="match" text=<> animate="yes" > <$edit tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Body/Placeholder}} minHeight="15px" class="tc-edit-texteditor tc-edit-texteditor-body" > <$set value=<> name="targetTiddler" > <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/EditorToolbar]!is[draft]]" > <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide" class="tc-text-editor-toolbar-item-wrapper" style="display: none;" > <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body/toolbar/button" mode="inline" /> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/EditorTools]!is[draft]]" > <$list filter={{!!condition}} variable="list-condition" > <$transclude/> <$reveal default={{$:/temp/fishing}} type="nomatch" text="" animate="yes" > <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="show" animate="yes" > <$diff-text source={{$:/temp/fishing}} dest={{!!text}} />
"},"Select":{"title":"Select","tags":"$:/tags/QuestionTemplate","code-body":"yes","text":"
<$reveal default={{{ [list[$:/temp/fishing]first[]] }}} type="nomatch" text=<> animate="yes" > {{!!title}} <$reveal default={{{ [list[$:/temp/fishing]first[]] }}} type="match" text=<> animate="yes" > <$reveal default={{{ [{!!title}split[__]count[]] }}} type="gteq" text="3" animate="yes" > <$list filter="[{!!title}split[__]first[]]" variable="question" > <> <$list filter="[{!!title}split[__]]" variable="titleitem" counter="counter" > <$reveal default={{{ [remainder[2]] }}} type="match" text="0" > <$let optionid={{{ [divide[2]] }}} optioncontent=<> selectid={{{ [{!!title}split[__]reverse[]first[]split[]count[]match[1]then[id]else] }}} > <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="show" animate="yes" > <$reveal default={{{ [{!!title}split[__]reverse[]first[]split[]count[]] }}} type="lteq" text="1" > <$radio tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" index=<> value=<> default="" > <> <$reveal default={{{ [{!!title}split[__]reverse[]first[]split[]count[]] }}} type="gt" text="1" > <$checkbox tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" index=<> checked=<> unchecked="" default="" > <> <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="show" animate="yes" > <$button disabled="yes" class="tc-btn-invisible" > <$reveal default={{{ [{!!title}split[__]reverse[]first[]split[]search-replace[A],[1]search-replace[B],[2]search-replace[C],[3]search-replace[D],[4]search-replace[E],[5]search-replace[F],[6]search-replace[G],[7]search-replace[H],[8]search-replace[I],[9]matchthen[1]else[0]] =[[$:/temp/fishing]getindexmatchthen[1]else[0]] +[join[]] }}} type="match" text="00" animate="yes" > {{$:/core/images/blank}} <$reveal default={{{ [{!!title}split[__]reverse[]first[]split[]search-replace[A],[1]search-replace[B],[2]search-replace[C],[3]search-replace[D],[4]search-replace[E],[5]search-replace[F],[6]search-replace[G],[7]search-replace[H],[8]search-replace[I],[9]matchthen[1]else[0]] =[[$:/temp/fishing]getindexmatchthen[1]else[0]] +[join[]] }}} type="match" text="01" animate="yes" > {{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$reveal default={{{ [{!!title}split[__]reverse[]first[]split[]search-replace[A],[1]search-replace[B],[2]search-replace[C],[3]search-replace[D],[4]search-replace[E],[5]search-replace[F],[6]search-replace[G],[7]search-replace[H],[8]search-replace[I],[9]matchthen[1]else[0]] =[[$:/temp/fishing]getindexmatchthen[1]else[0]] +[join[]] }}} type="match" text="10" animate="yes" > {{$:/core/images/warning}} <$reveal default={{{ [{!!title}split[__]reverse[]first[]split[]search-replace[A],[1]search-replace[B],[2]search-replace[C],[3]search-replace[D],[4]search-replace[E],[5]search-replace[F],[6]search-replace[G],[7]search-replace[H],[8]search-replace[I],[9]matchthen[1]else[0]] =[[$:/temp/fishing]getindexmatchthen[1]else[0]] +[join[]] }}} type="match" text="11" animate="yes" > {{$:/core/images/done-button}} <> <$reveal default={{{ [{!!title}split[__]count[]] }}} type="lt" text="3" animate="yes" > {{!!title}}
"},"Word":{"title":"Word","tags":"$:/tags/QuestionTemplate","code-body":"yes","text":"{{!!word}} <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="hide" animate="yes" > <$reveal default={{!!text}} type="match" text="" animate="yes" >
